name: White_Reclining_Sofa
description:
Elegant and luxurious, this plush and eye-catching recliner sofa allows you to sink in to
  comfort after a long, tiring day. This recliner sofa has an attractive and
  chic gloss black tone, making it a perfect fit for virtually any room
  decor/ color scheme. Additional accents include deeply padded armrests along
  with waterfall-style seatbacks and seat cushions for a distinctive look and
  appeal. Quality craftsmanship in every detail ensures comfort and durability.
  Modern, dramatic and inviting, this striking recliner sofa is a stunning
  showcase for any room in your home.
    Furniture Pattern: SolidType: Sofa, ReclinerStyle: ContemporaryMaterial: PolyurethaneAssembledColor: WhiteDimensions: 87 inches long x 38 inches wide x 39 inches highStyleContemporaryMaterialPolyurethaneTypeRecliner, SofaAssemblyAssembledColorWhiteFurniture PatternSolid
